body: "Lusophony, identity and diversity in the network" [pt] is the title of an article written by the Portuguese researcher Lourdes Macedo (republished in the blog Buala), with reflections on the contribution that "cyberspace may offer to consolidate the collective conscience of a Lusophone community. "
original_body: "Lusophony, identity and diversity in the network" [pt] is the title of an article written by the Portuguese researcher Lourdes Macedo (republished in the blog Buala), with reflections on the contribution that "cyberspace may offer to consolidate the collective conscience of a Lusophone community. "
title: Lusophone collective conscience and cyberspace

sentence: "Lusophony, identity and diversity in the network" [pt] is the title of an article written by the Portuguese researcher Lourdes Macedo (republished in the blog Buala), with reflections on the contribution that "cyberspace may offer to consolidate the collective conscience of a Lusophone community.
